sentences.sContent: the risks involved in such an audacious operation
sentences.sCn: 如此大胆的行动中存在的风险

remMethod.val: aud(大胆) + acious(多…的) → 大胆的

words.tran: 无畏地；放肆地；大胆创新地；无拘无束地

trans.tranCn: 大胆的, 卤莽的, 大胆创新的
trans.tranOther: showing great courage or confidence in a way that is impressive or slightly shocking
